trans-unit.source: Alike other systems, publishing to stage and live is done via branch management.
trans-unit.target: Alike other systems, publishing to stage and live is done via branch management.

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can assign one branch to be your sandbox, staging branch, and another to be your live branch.
trans-unit.target: Thus, you can assign one branch to be your sandbox, staging branch, and another to be your live branch.

trans-unit.source: master branch is the branch associated with staging.
trans-unit.target: master branch is the branch associated with staging.

trans-unit.source: live branch is the production branch associated with live.
trans-unit.target: live branch is the production branch associated with live.

trans-unit.source: Note that this means that once the content is committed to one of the corresponding branch, the content will automatically get published to their assigned environment.
trans-unit.target: Note that this means that once the content is committed to one of the corresponding branch, the content will automatically get published to their assigned environment.

trans-unit.source: Both English and localized content follow the same logic for a given repo.
trans-unit.target: Both English and localized content follow the same logic for a given repo.

trans-unit.source: The submitter of the changes as well as those in the (notification list)[repo-config.md], will get a mail indicating whether the build is successful or not, a link to the documentation, as well as a link to the build report.
trans-unit.target: The submitter of the changes as well as those in the (notification list)[repo-config.md], will get a mail indicating whether the build is successful or not, a link to the documentation, as well as a link to the build report.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, teams can look at the <linkText>Open Publishing Portal</linkText><title></title> for build status and logs of current and past builds.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, teams can look at the <linkText>Open Publishing Portal</linkText><title></title> for build status and logs of current and past builds.
